VA Home Loan Program Application Forms
There are two application forms related to the VA home loan program:
VA Form 26-1880
,
Request for a Certificate of Eligibility
, and
VA Form 26-1817
,

title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Home Loan Program
